name: Project Spell Witch
description:
Made for the Fall All-OGA Game Jam 2018. Comes in either an installer or a zip with an executable inside.

You are only a rookie witch. And yet, strange monsters have taken over the castle. Find the right magic, and use it in the right way to reach the next room in this puzzle-platformer!

Author's Note: I'm very happy to say that I was able to finish something I can call done, though I couldn't include everything I wanted.   If I missed any important instructions for the submission, please let me know; though I'm positive I got the credits correct. Thank you for this opportunity.
